column2: Does anyone know how this works, and why it hasn't been fixed by @Opensea? The decimal point moves one spot to the right when you go to purchase an NFT. I had this happen to me months ago. I'm told it's a scam by the seller, and not a bug in the system? Is that correct? https://t.co/a3XRERSFCP
The Opensea email asking you to verify your account is a phishing scam. Do not click. This is not @opensea. The scam email address is noreply@openseateam.io. Stay safe frens. ğŸ”
